soft_skills.phrase: work directly with entrepreneurs and business counterparts
Experiment and implement new AI technologies

classification.rationale: The role heavily emphasizes building and deploying GenAI solutions, including voicebots and document interaction, using technologies like ChatGPT. It also requires strong software development skills to bring these AI solutions from idea to production, aligning with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.
